subject: Hockey, Ice
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Cam Atkinson had three goals and Carl Sneep scored a 170-foot short-handed goal to help Boston College beat Yale, 9-7, in the Northeast Regional final.
snippet: Cam Atkinson had three goals and Carl Sneep scored a 170-foot short-handed goal to help Boston College beat Yale, 9-7, in the Northeast Regional final.
